State-Trait Anger Expression Inventor

References:
Schwenkmezger, P., Hodapp, V. & Spielberger, C. D. (1992). Das State- Trait- Ã„rgerausdrucks- Inventar STAXI. Huber.
Spielberger, C. D. (1988). State-Trait Anger Expression Inventory (STAXI). Research edition. Odessa, FL: Psychological Assessment Resources.
Fuqua, D. R., Leonard, E., Masters, M. A., Smith, R. J., Campbell, J. L., & Fischer, P. C. (1991). A structural analysis of the state-trait anger expression inventory. Educational and Psychological Measurement, 51(2), 439-446.

Measures 'anger as a situational emotional response (state) and as a predispositional quality (trait)' (Fuqua et al., 1991, page 439)
